caption: The video starts from a scene of illegal private gambling house. A young man with yellow hair was playing mahjong with others. However, he was then taken to a small room because he owed too much money. Even his house canâ€™t afford the interest. He was beaten to the ground. After the owners having a discussion, they decided to strangle him. Then the scene switch to police station, where a plain clothe is talking to his leader. Then, the plain clothes went home for small rest. After that, he set off again to deal with a bullying issue happened on the street.
